executeCsrRW(MemoryInteractor,uint32,uin.details: The specific instruction is decided by insncode, which defines the value to be written.

params.mi: MemoryInteractor with which Step function is interacting

returns._0: true if instruction was executed successfuly and false if its an illegal insn exception

executeCsrRW(MemoryInteractor,uint32,uin.notice: Implementation of CSRRW and CSRRWI instructions
